channel.title: Dockercompose on Dvir Segal's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Dockercompose on Dvir Segal's blog

item.title: How to use docker-compose, volumes, networks, and more
item.description: This is the last post in the simplify docker series ( if you haven’t read the previous ones, go ahead and read them, it will make more sense afterward — part I & part II). This time I’ll cover networks, docker-compose, docker volumes, and more. What is it all about with docker-compose? Link to heading Docker-compose allows you to define and run multi-container Docker applications. With Compose, you configure your app’s services using YAML files (more on YAML here).
